summary:
Teacher, Trainer and Educator, Personal Assistant / Carer, HR, Quality Admin, Auditor, Safety Mgt, PA, Intercultural Management and Communication: International culture consultant, Psychologist, Psychology & Pedagogy teacher, School psychologist.

Specialities: Good understanding, planning and organisational skills, effective hands-on execution, goal and result oriented, good analyzer, strong communication and other soft skills, team player, continues improvement.

profile_positions.description:
Providing all necessary professional day care teacher responsibilities to children of 3 month - 4 y.o.
Triodus have the Reggio Emilia (RE) Approach, a system created for infant, toddler, and preschool centers. The teaching programme based on the principles of respect, responsibility, and community through exploration and discovery in a supportive and enriching environment based on the interests of the children through a self-guided curriculum. The philosophy is based on a unique view of the child.

In babies group & mixed age group teach the babies how to hold their own food and bottle / cup, prepare / warm up baby-food, feed them, sterilize the food equipment, clean & change them, put them to sleep according to the common procedures. Show children how it is possible to play with toys, cubes & balls and other children. Read books to them, sing nursery rhymes, dance, play for ex. peek-a-boo, finger paint, make physical exercise, walk, gymnastics. Teach through playing & having fun how to speak and understand other. 
Teach the older children (from 2 to 4 y.o.) how to be more responsible for themselves (use a toilet, wash hands, tidy up after themselves, put on & of clothes and shoes, use utensils): draw, put a puzzle, play more active games, communicate and solve small issues with other children, read, sing and dance with them. 
General responsibilities: Provide a safe caring educational environment for small children. Teach them how to be independent, be able to make their own choice, decisions, perform them & take responsibilities for their actions. Support, coordinate and correct children's development and behavior. Prevent injuries, take care of a hurt / injured child by taking right decisions & actions. Yearly update First Aid & CPR for minors. Be a real team player, especially with the teachers from the same group. Divide responsibilities in consensus. Have open communication with children, colleagues and the parents.
profile_positions.title: Daycare Teacher

profile_positions.description: Part-time working as a psychotherapist with Russian expatriates using various psychological methods like Gestalt, Cognitive Psychology and EFT method, existential and Structural Family therapy. Perform psycho-diagnostic of children etc.
profile_positions.title: Psychotherapeut for Russian speaking expatriates

profile_positions.description:
Take care of the Quality Assurance & Quality Controls Administration. Audit the Company Operating System, i.e. Quality Management System (QMS). Together with the managers improve and roll-out improved QMS, maintain it. Provide guidance to process owners in preparing, publishing and using of QMS documents. Publish QMS documentation. Update Lessons Learned (LL) Database, provide guidance to users. Assist Quality Manager with various tasks. Assist the Gate Review (GR) Project execution Model Coordinator, in his absence perform duty of the GR Coordinator. Make project tracking according to the UK system. Help to set-up the QMS in our new office in Saudi Arabia. Help to prepare a proposal for Audit & Review Schedule. Together with Quality Manager work on Project System Audits and together with GR Coordinator on project GR's. Perform internal audits and on delegation of Quality Manager prepare a programme for a corporate audit in our office. Control of Non-conformance: collect NCR, follow up on them and prepare CAR's. Update LL Procedure, develop LL Programme. On assignment of MD responsible for Company's re-branding exercises (supervised work of 7 proj. secretaries). Communicate & coordinate with managers on the use of the QMS Departmental, PEM and other Procedures to check, ease and improve the work and quality results. Support managers. Prepare QA reports, training, workshops, PPT's, MoM's, follow ups, improve & prevent bad results using GR's, CAR's and LL. Together with QA Committee drive a continues improvement process. 

2007 Participant of the PM & Quality sessions, by PMI UK (Project Management Institute UK), ESI
2007-2008 Company's Secretary of the Works Council and Vice European representative of the Works Council on the Corporate level.
profile_positions.title: Quality Administrator

profile_positions.description:
Worked as a Personal Assistant / Carer (Substitute) in the summer period. Work in the service house for elderly people. The main persons had different diagnoses including diabetes, HB, dementia, Alzheimer etc. Work was mostly in the day time, but also some time night shifts when needed. I was part of the team of PA's and med sisters who provide all basic help for the elderly, including assistance with the meds, eye drops, hygiene, bathing, toileting, feeding and so on. We also tried to make they life as active as possible, we took them to the meeting and TV rooms where they could meet each other and their children and grandchildren, took the to the hair cutters and churches when it was possible, make the ladies curler, read them their posts, listen their stories, invite students youngsters to play table games with them, make physical and memory excesses etc. We also celebrate their Birthdays in the common room: we took walks and assisted them with doctors meetings.

Please contact me for more information.
profile_positions.title: Personal Assistant / Carer

profile_positions.description: Working with employees competence development programmes like NTP and Leadership reviews. Together with HR Manager give local recommendation on improvement of the People Policy and develop a new Performance appraisal Procedure. Develop, analyse, evaluate and improve different HR processes, appraisals and programmes. Prepare and facilitate Company induction. Organise Internal & External people and High and Middle Management trainings on how to use MyPAD system, an electronic Norwegian system with aim to improve quality and performance of the H&M Management and their Departments. Together with the Process Department Head Arjan Vrugte recruit process engineers from the Chalmers, process engineering university in Sweden. Helping with personnel files. Building organisational charts.  Work with People Survey on different levels together with the owner and the coordinator of the People Survey tool from Oslo Norway resp. Stockton UK, compare and analyse results and causes of the local People Survey versus the corporate results, prepare and facilitate a common PPT for our international managers on how to work with the People Surveys results and their own PBC's (Personal Business Commitments). Draft reports and status reports, prepare MoMs. Travel within our European organisation to work with the NTP and PBC's. Offices I have been travelling to: Antwerp Belgium, Langenfeld Germany, Rotterdam Netherlands, Solent UK, Stockton on Tees UK.
profile_positions.title: HR Development Officer

profile_positions.description:
Work as a Personal Assistant / Carer for a mute adult person with SCI in all areas of his personal and domestic need, accompany and aide him in all day to day activities, providing appropriate assistance at the right time in the right place vary accordingly, enabling him to carry out by him chosen activity whether inside or outside the home to keep him active, by carrying out any request which he may reasonably make, facilitating him to have control over his life. Have clear understanding of my PA role and responsibilities in facilitating of his self-defined needs.

Work mostly evening & night shifts, but also days & weekends when needed. Work with all needs and interests of his at home, bathing and washing & combing his hair, make hair cuts, assistance with face & hands washing, brushing teethes, toileting, dressing/undressing, cleaning of his tubes and air, continence equipment. Read to him, listen to music and see films he choose or give me to choose; feeding and make drinks. Make preparations before sleep, changing linens. Giving medicine, take care of him at nights, turn and put and correct the mask true the night. Help with  domestic stuff. 

Providing company & support outside the home e.g. with pushing wheelchair, commuting: assistance with load and unload wheelchair; negotiating difficult places with steps. Make shopping, travel with him up to few days to concerts & festivals. Accompany to the doctors appointments and friends. 

Care of his pat and his house plants. Respect his lifestyle, routine and opinions. Do not interfere or impose my own judgments and opinions unless requested to do so. Remember that my “work” is just to enable him to lead an independent lifestyle of him chosen. Plan the activities & actions based on his leads and check through the process if everything is going as it should. Respect his privacy, be his confidant, discrete. Respect his possessions and home; my ‘workplace’ is his home. Always have an open communication on any issue.
profile_positions.title: Personal Assistant / Carer

profile_positions.description: Consultancy for Sales, Operations & Quality and HR departments. Consultancy/training for Managers. Facilitation of the intermediate help on the customer meetings with Russian and other East clients. Visiting of the Pulp & Paper Mills and workshops together with the sales representatives, start-up/commission manager, quality manager and clients. Assist in Quality Assurance and Quality Control questions. When needed - help to interpretate on technical issues for Russian and Swedish representatives and clients. Analyse and evaluate the outcome of the visits to the clients with Quality manager and analyse and evaluate the outcome of the visits of the clients together with the Operational and BD director.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Worked as a  Personal Assistant / Carer (substitute in the summer period) for two elderly persons in their apartments. Has been part of the two PA's teams. One person had a dementia and Alzheimer the other Alzheimer. Have worked in day & night shifts. Performed all daily needs assistance to both of the people with one more person from the team. Aide the persons, cook for them, feed them, help with the hygiene, take walks to the parks and other social places, give meds, put eye drops, stay with them at night. Meet their children and grandchildren, prepare the persons and house for the meetings. Assist with the help in the garden. With one of the persons I prepared and did a lot of memory and physical training. With the other we tried to do anything best possible. We tried keep to keep both main persons as active as possible.

Please, for more information contact me.
profile_positions.title: Personal Assistant / Carer

volunteer_experiences.role: Member of ACCESS org in different groups

company.name: ACCESS, the org. for ex-pats in The Netherlands

volunteer_experiences.description:
http://www.access-nl.org/

ACCESS is a not-for-profit organisation supporting the international community in the Netherlands.
Whether you are working here on an expatriate assignment, have recently relocated, studying or have made Holland your home, then our free information and range of services are here to support you.
I have been one of the members part-time helping the expats with their issues and problems.

 
Serving the international community for more than 25 years!

volunteer_experiences.description: Have performed duties of a Treasure & Member of the Board of PA (Parents Association) of our son's school.

As a part-time volunteer have translated university school books for the Russian students who live in pereferi (long far away from the big towns) places, so that they have also chance to get an university education.
